summary:
Immersive Environment is a setting for \"FXAA Post Process Injector\".
These settings increase the detail of the textures, changing the color and shading to a better immersion for a world more real.
descriptionHtml:
[size=200][b][color=#68c1ff]Immersive Environment 1.4[/color][/b][/size]

[b]I recommend using this mod with [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3068]Immersive Water 3[/url].[/b]

-----------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Comparison with the vanilla[/color][/b]
-----------------------

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/707/comparative1.jpg/][IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/751/comparative1.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/683/comparative3.jpg/][IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/25/comparative3.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/853/comparative4.jpg/][IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/2391/comparative4.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

-----------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Description[/color][/b]
-----------------------

Immersive Environment is a setting for \"FXAA Post Process Injector\".

These settings increase the detail of the textures, changing the color and shading to a better immersion in a world more real.
 
-----------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Install:[/color][/b]
-----------------------
Extract the zip to your skyrim folder.

-----------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Uninstall:[/color][/b]
-----------------------

Delete the files.

-----------------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]How to adjust:[/color][/b]
-----------------------------

Open injFX_Settings.h with notepad and adjust the values with care.

-----------------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Tips:[/color][/b]
-----------------------------

Enable antialisaing and FXAA of the game to get a better smoothing filter sharpen. 

-----------------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Keys:[/color][/b]
-----------------------------

PAUSE : Enable/Disable the mod

-----------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Changelog:[/color][/b]
-----------------------
1.4
- Less blue 
- More sharpen
- Warmer colors
- FXAA Injector is now included for easier installation

1.3
- less blue
- shadow slightly reinforced
- Less bright sky
- Less bright snow

1.2
- Noise reduction
- Brighter colors
- Bloom Correction

1.1
- The Sharpen has been reduced. 

-----------------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]Credits[/color][/b]
-----------------------------

Settings by Gnozer

FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude 

-----------------------------
[b][color=#68c1ff]My other mod:[/color][/b]
-----------------------------

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3068]Immersive Water 3[/url]
